Title: Reign of Assassins
Actors: Michelle Yeoh, Woo-sung Jung, Xueqi Wang, Barbie Hsu
Plot: Set in ancient China, Zeng Jing is a skilled assassin who finds herself in possession of a mystical Buddhist monk's remains. She begins a quest to return the remains to its rightful resting place, and thus places herself in mortal danger because a team of assassins is in a deadly pursuit to possess the remains which holds an ancient power-wielding secret.
Production: Beijing Gallop Horse Film & TV Production, Media Asia Films Ltd. [hk]
